item.description:
Please join us for some ACIM discussion and then an opportunity to socialize over a bowl of hearty soup and some good bread.  

Now that fall has arrived, we are restarting our tradition of getting together once a month for Soup and Bread.  You not required to bring anything unless you really feel motivated to do so.  We take turns providing the soup and bread. 

There will be some handouts from a study guide that we will be using.  If you have a copy of ACIM, please bring it.  If not, we have a few extra.  We should have enough handouts for everyone.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: ACIM Study Group with Soup Social following
